text: Þis is ærest se forma capitul, hu hit gebyreð to foresceawienne be þære synne mæðe.
Hit gebyrað, þæt se sacerd smeage synfulra manna bote be bisceopes dome.
& ne wandige he na ne for ricum ne for heanum, þæt he him riht tæce swa him seo boc tæcð.
Forþam se hælend cwæð, gif se sacerd nolde þam synfullan his synna bote tæcan, þæt he eft þa sawle æt him secean wolde.
Be þam men þe on his ytemestan dæge his synna gecyrran wyle to dædbote, þæt him man þæs ne wyrne.
Sanctus Isodorus cwæð, þæt wen wære, þæt þæs mannes soðe andetnes & gecyrrednes gode andfenge wære on his ytemestan dæge.
Forþam se hælend cwæð, on swa hwylcum dæge swa se man gecyrð to gode, life he leofað & na ne swelteð.
Þi nis na to onscunienne seo soðe gecyrrednes on swa hwylcum timan swa hit sy.
Forþam god besceawað ælces mannes ingeðang & wat ealra manna heortena digelnessa.
Be þam men þe gyrnð dædbote & wegnyste, þæt is cristes <lichama>, for deaðes ege, & be þam þe him his spræc ofnimð ær him his scrift to cume.
Þises is þearf, þæt se sacerd swa geradne man frefrige & his andetnesse gehyre & him huruþinga husles ne wyrne.

& þeah he beo mid þære untrumnesse swa gehefegod þæt he sprecan ne mæge swa he ær mihte, þonne gif he gewitnesse hæfð þæra manna þe him mid beoð, þæt he scriftes gyrnde & husles, þonne do se sacerd him forgifenesse & his gerihto.
Be þam men þe smeað ymbe his synna andetnesse.

<Gif> <ænig> man wilnað dædbote to underfonne for his synnum, þonne tweonað him eft for þæra synna manigfealdnesse & bið orwene, þæt he ne mæge þa bote aberan þe his scrift him tæcð, & forlæt hit, þonne bið him seo orwennis to maran synne geteald þonne þa synna þe he geðohte to andettenne & þæt þa forlet.

Ac se ðe wylle mid andbryrdnesse his synna andettan, onfo se sacerd hine & him þa bote tæce þe þærto gebyreð, þæt seo gewundode sawl þe mid synnum bið gebunden & gewundod mote becuman to þam soðan læcedome, þæt is godes forgifnes.
Be þam þe se man hine forhabban sceal on manegum þingum his lifes lusta, gif he wyle his synna bote habban.
An is þæt se rihtwisa man hreowsige hine sylfne swylce he wið god forworht sy, & oðer is þæt he forhicge þa þing þe his lichaman leofeste syn for lufan þæs ecean lifes.
Forþam Paulus se apostol cwæð, Ealle þing me synt alyfede, ac hi ne fremiað me ealle, þæt is, woruldlic wilnung þæt hit nan þæra manna ne fremeð þe hit fullice begæð.
Forþam is ælcum men mycel þearf, þæt he his synna ne forhogige to andettenne oððe to betenne.
Forþam ælcum men is betere, þæt he his synna her bete þonne he on þam ecum tintregum þurhwunian scyle.
Be þam þe þam dædbetan nis alyfed nænie cypinge to drifanne.

Sanctus Isodorus þe þas boc sette sprecð ymbe þa men þe dædbote underfoð for hefelicum gyltum & hwilum eard forboden bið & segð, þæt him na alyfed ne bið, þæt he on ceapstowe ænige cypinge bega ne hine sylfne ne abysige ymbe nane worldlice bysgunge, ær þam þe he gefylled hæbbe þæt him his scrift tæhte.
Be þam ðe se dædbeta æfter his dædbote hreownesse ne sceal gecyrran to þisse worulde gefeohte.

Halige gewritu cweðað þæt hit ungedafenlic sy þæt se dædbeta, æfter þam þe he gebet hæfð swa him his scrift tæhte, þæt he hine na on þa wisan þissa worldlicra þinga ne underþeode, þæt he æfre ne beþence ymbe þa hreowsunge þe he ær hreowsade.
Forþam sanctus Paulus cwæð, þæt se godes þeow þe gode sceal þeowian ne sceal hine na abysgian worldlicra bysgunga.
Be ðam þe se dædbeta ne healt þæt his scrift him tæcð.
Se halga apostol cwyð sanctus Petrus, þæt se man þe gecyrð æfter his synna bote to þisse worlde idelnesse ealswa þam hunde bið þe spiwð & eft fret.

Þis synt þa idelnessa þisse worlda, ærost is ofermetta & nið & æfesta & hatheortnes & stala & druncennes & galscipe & dyrne geligro & lyblac & gytsung & reaflac & scincræft & manslihtas & feala oðra þissa gelican.
Soðlice se <man> se ðe þas þing begæð, ne bið he na wyrðe ænigre gemænnesse mid æwfæstum mannum.

& þeah <he> to cyrcan <gange> mid oðrum mannum, ne gedyrstlæce he hine þæt he hine to godes weofode gehnige oððe cristes lichaman underfo, ær þam þe he to dædbote gecyrre & syððan do swa him his scrift tæce & wisige.
Be þam þe þam dædbetan mæg beon geseald þurh biscopes þingunge forgifenes.
Nis þam bisceope ne þam <sacerde> þam men to forwyrnenne scriftes þe him þæs to gyrnð, þeah he mid þære manifealdnesse þære synne bisgung abisgod sy.
Forþam godes mildheortnes is swa mycel, swa nis nan eorðlic man þæt mæge oðrum his mildheortnesse areccan.
& eac se witega cwyð þurh þone halgan gast, gif se synfulla man gehwyrfð fram his synnum to bote, þonne bið he hal.
& eft he cwyð, andette þe sylf þine unrihtwisnesse, þæt þu beo gerihtwisod, & se sealmsceop cwyð, þæt mid drihtne sy unarimedlicu mildheortnes.
Þy sceal se bisceop & se sacerd mildheortlice þam synfullan deman, forþam nis nan man leahterleas.
Be þam men þe gyrnð husles æt orwenum life & eft of þam yfele ariseð.

On þæra haligra apostola lare is gereht, gif se man on his ytemestan dæge gyrneð cristes lichaman to underfonne, ne wyrne him man na, þeah he on hreowsunge ær wære & hit fullice gebet næbbe, forþam þæt bið his wegnyst <&> <ælces> þæra manna þe to godes rice becymð.
& gif he eft to þisum life gehwyrfð & þæt gehealt þæt he gode behet & his scrifte, bruce his godes dæl & wunige him mid þeawfæstum mannum.
Be þam þe se mæssepreost þæne dædbetan underfon ne mot butan bisceopes leafan, butan he þone bisceop geræcean ne mæge.

Þam sacerde gedafenað soðlice, þæt he geornlice asmeage ymbe þæra manna sawle þearfe þe him æt bote seceað, hu he hy rihtlicost getrymman mæge to godes willan & to heora sawle þearfe, & him bote tæce a be þæs gyltes mæðe.
& gif þa gyltas to þam hefelice beon þæt he <to> bisceopes dome tæcan þurfe, tæce him þider.
Forþam sanctus Agustinus cwæð on oðre stowe, þæt gif hwa mid heafodlicum synnum gebunden wære, þæt man him to bisceopes dome tæcean sceolde.
& gif he bisceop geræcean ne mæge, þæt se mæssepreost æt þam þingum þæne bisceop aspelian mote.
Be þam dædbetan, on hwylcum timan him man forgifenesse don scyle.
Þas þeawas man healt begeondan sæ mid cristenum folce, þæt is þæt ælc bisceop bið æt his biscopstole on þæne wodnesdæg þe we cweðaðcaput ieiuniumær lenctene.
Þonne ælc þæra manna þe mid heafodleahtre besmiten bið on þære scire sceal on þæne dæg him to cuman & his synna him andettan, & he þonne him tæcð heora synna bote ælcum be þæs gyltes mæðe.

& <hi> swa þonne be his leafe ham hwyrfað, & eft on þæne þunres dæg ær eastron to þære ylcan stowe ealle gesamniað, & heom se bisceop ofer singð & forgifenesse deð, & hy swa ham hwyrfað mid þæs bisceopes bletsunge.

Þis is þus to healdenne eallum cristenum folce, & þeh hwæðere sceal se sacerd geornlice smeagean, mid hwylcere anbryrdnesse & mid hwylcere fulfremednesse se dædbeta gebet hæbbe þæt him getæht wæs, & swa him be þam forgifenesse do.
Be þam men þe bið husel forboden & under þam forðfærð.
Be þisum þingum ne cunne we smeagean nan oðer þing, butan hit sy on godes dome gelang, forþam on godes anwealde wæs, þæt he butan husle gewat.
Be þam men þe for mislicum gyltum to his synna bote gecyrran wyle mid fulre anbryrdnesse.

Se man se ðe mid manigfealdum leahtrum gebunden bið & þa mid anbryrdum mode & for lufe þæs ecean lifes andettan wylle his scrifte & betan swa he him tæce, we gelyfað þæt he æt gode forgifenesse hæbbe.
Be Iacobes ærendgewrite þæs halgan apostoles, on þam segð hu man sceal for þæne seocan man gebiddan & hine mid ele smyrian.

Her tæcð sanctus Iacobus, þæt gif hwa geuntrumad beo, þæt he gelaðige him his sacerd to & oðre godes þeowas, þæt hi him ofer rædan & se untruma his þearfe him secge & hy hine smyrigean on godes naman mid þam halgan ele.
& þurh þæra geleafulra manna bene & þurh þa smyrenesse he mæg beon gehealden, & drihten hine aræreð, & gif he synful bið hy beoð him forgifene.
Þy sceal ælc geleaful man, gif he mæg, þa smyrenesse begitan & þa gerihto þe þærto gebyriað.
Forþam hit is awriten, þæt ælc þæra manna þe þas gerihto hæfð, þæt his sawl bið gelice clæne æfter his forðsiðe ealswa þæt cild bið þe æfter fulwihte sona gewit.
Be þam men þe willes man <ofslyhð>.
Se læweda man þe oðerne ofslyhð butan gylte, fæste VII ger, þa þreo on hlafe & on wætere, & þa IIII swa him his scrift tæce.
& æfter þæra VII geara bote æfre he geornlice hreowsige his misdæda be þam dæle þe he mæge, gif he fulle forgifenesse æt gode habban wyle, forþam him is uncuð hu andfenge gode wæron his bota.
Se man se ðe oðerne ofslean wyle & ne mæg his willan þurhteon, fæste III ger, I ger on hlafe & on wætere, & þa II swa <him> his scrift tæce.
Gif læwede man neadunga man ofslyhð, fæste III ger, an ger on hlafe & on wætere, & þa II swa him his scrift wisige.
Gif hit bið subdiacon, fæste VI ger, gif hit <beo> diacon, fæste VII ger, gif hit <beo> mæssepreost, <fæste> X ger, gif hit <beo> biscop, <fæste> XII ger.
Gif hwa his cild ofslyhð to deaðe ungewealdes, fæste III ger, an on hlafe & on wætere, & þa twa swa him his scrift tæce.
Gif bisceop oððe mæssepreost man ofslea, þolige his hades.
Be þam wifmen þe hig forligeð & þonne for ege hire bearn fordeð.

Gif <hwylc> wif hire cild amyrð innan hire mid drence oððe mid oðrum mislicum þingum, oððe formyrþreð syððan hit forð cymð, fæste X ger, þa III on halfe & on wætere, & þa VII swa hire scrift hire mildheortlice tæcean wylle.
Be þam men þe his þeowan ofslyhð for þyfðe butan his hundredes gewitnesse.
Gif hwylc man his æht ofslehð, & he nane gewitnesse næbbe þæt he forworht sy, butan he hine for his hatheortnesse & for his gymeleaste ofslyhð, fæste II ger.
Be þam gif wif ofslyhð hire wifman for andan.

Gif hwylc wif for hwylcum lyðrum andan hire wifman swingeð, & heo þurh þa swingele wurð dead, & heo unscyldig bið, fæste seo hlæfdige VII ger, gif heo þonne gewitnesse hæbbe, þæt heo scyldig sy, fæste heo III ger.
Be þam men þe hine sylfne ofslyhð for hwylcere gymeleaste, & be þam men þe for his gyltum bið gewitnod.
Se man <se> ðe hine sylfne ofslyhð mid wæpne oððe for hwylcum mislicum deofles onbringe, nis hit na alyfed þæt man <for> swylcum men mæssan singe oððe mid ænigum sealmsange þæt lic eorðan befæste.
Þæne ylcan dom man sceal don þam ðe for his gylta pinunga his lif alett.
Be þam men þe ungedafenlice hæmð, þæt is wið nytenum, oððe hine mid geonglingum besmiteð, oððe wæpnedman wið oðerne.

Se man þe hine wið nytenu besmiteð, oððe wæpnedman wið oðerne mid ungesceadelicum þinge, gif he bið XX wintra eald man, þæt he understandan mæg þæt he þa <sceamlican> þing & þa manfullan begæð, geswice & andette & fæste XV <winter>.
& gif se man his gemæccan hæbbe & he beo XL wintra & swylce þing begæð, geswice & fæste þa hwile þe his lif beo & ne gedyrstlæce þæt he drihtnes lichaman underfo ær his endedæge.
Geonge men & andgitlease man sceal þearle swingan ðe swylce ðing begað.
Be þam þe æwe brecað oððe æwebrece habbað.
Gif se man æwe brycð, fæste VII gear ðry dagas on wucan on hlafe & on wætere, & gif wif ofer hire rihthlaford oðerne man hæbbe, beo heo ðæs ylcan wurðe.
Be þam men þe his æwe forlæt, & be þam wife þe hire wer forlæt & oðerne cyst.

Se man þe his rihtæwe forlæt & oðer <wif> nimð, he bið æwbreca, ne sylle him nan preost husl ne nan ðara gerihta þe cristenum men gebyreð, & gif him forðsið getimað, ne lecge hine man na <mid> cristenum mannum.
& gif wif hire rihtwer forlæt & cysð oðerne, beo heo þæs ylcan domes wyrðe þe herbufan sægð.
& þa magas þe æt þam dihte wæron ðolien þæne ylcan dom, butan hi ær to bote gecyrron wyllon swa hire scrift him tæce.
Be ðam men þe hæfð his æwe & eac cifese.
Se man ðe rihtæwe hæfð & eac cyfese, ne sylle him nan preost husl ne nan gerihto þe man cristenum mannum deð, butan he to bote gecyrre.
& gif he cyfesan hæbbe & nane rihtæwe, he <ah> ðæs to donne swa him geðincð, wite he þeah þæt he beo on anre gehealden, beo hit cyfes beo hit æwe.
Be þam men þe hæfð his rihtæwe & geræst on elþeodigum wifmen.
Gif hwylc man wið oðre rihtæwe <hæmð>, oððe wif wið oðres <wifes> rihtgemæccean, fæste VII ger, þa III on hlafe & on wætere, & þa IIII swa him his scrift tæce.
Be þam men þe wifað on twam geswusternum, oððe wif nimð broðor æfter oðrum.
Gif hwylc wif twegen gebroðro nymð hire to gemæccean, oðerne æfter oðrum, todo man hi, & beon hi on dædbote þa <hwile> ðe hi lybban swa hira scrift him tæce.
& æt hira forðsiðe do se sacerd him þa gerihto swa man cristenum mannum deð, gif hi þæt gehatað þæt hi leng betan woldon gif hi leng lybban mosten.
Gif hwa on swylcum manfullum sinscipe ðurhwunað oð his lifes ænde, ne cunne we him nane bote tæcean, butan hit is æt godes dome gelang.
Be þam gif hwylc wifman beweddod beo, nis hit na alyfed þæt hine ænig oðer man æt þam bereafige.
Gif hwylc wif beweddod beo, nis hit na alyfed þæt hwylc oðer man hine ðæs bereafige, gif hit hwa do, beo he amansumad.
Be þam men þe wif oððe mæden ofernimð mid unrihtum þingum.
Gif hwa mid his ofercræfte wif oððe mæden neadinga nimð to unrihthæmede hire unwilles, beo he amansumad.
Be þam men þe þæne wifman fram his hlaforde aspanð þe his wicnere bið, for unrihtum hæmede.
Gif hwa mid his lotwrencum oðres mannes folgere fram him apæce for hæmedðinge, & hire unwilles wið hi hæme, gif <he> bið gehadod man, þolige his hades, gif he beo læwede, beo he amansumad.
Be þam gif mædenman <beweddod> bið & hine oðer man þæs bereafige hire unwilles.

Gif hwylc mæden beweddod bið & under ðam bið gehergod, oððe mid sumum intingan afyrred beo þam þe heo beweddod wæs & hit æft gelimpe þæt hi on neawist becumen, be leafe hi moton togædere, forðan heo wæs hire unwilles fram him.
Be þam gif gehadod mæden to hæmedþinge <geræsð>.

Gif hwylc wifman gehadod bið gemænes hades, & heo syððan forhogie ðæne brydguman þe heo ær beweddod wæs, þæt is crist, <&> to woruldlicre idelnesse gecyrð & hiwrædene underfehð, & ðencð þæt heo mid hire æhton & woruldspedon þa æbylignesse gebete þe heo gode abylhð, <nis> <þæt> <naht>.
Ac ne mæg heo nan þara ðinga gedon þe gode <licwyrðe> beo, ne hire nan preost scrifan ne mot ær heo þæne synscipe forlæte & to criste gecyrre, & syððan hire lif libbe swa hire scrift <hire> tæce.
Be ungehadod mædene þe to unrihtum hæmede geræsð.

Gif hwylc mædenman on geferrædenne mid gehadedum mannum wunað, & heo to þam ylcan hade þence & under þam þurh deofles costunga on hæmedþing geræse, ne bið heo na wið god unscyldig, þeah heo ungehadod wære, forþam ðe heo ær þohte þæt heo godes bryd wurðan wolde, þonne is hire mycel nydþearf þæt heo hire misdæda andette & bete swa hire scrift <hire> tæce.
Be þam men þe on his magan <gewifað>.

Gif hwylc man wifige on his nehstan magan oððe on his gefæderan oððe on his broðor lafe oððe on his steopmoder, beo he amansumad fram eallum cristenum mannum, & gif he to bote gecyrð swa he þearfe ah, bete he æfre & hreowsige þa hwile þe he beo be bisceopes dome.
Be þam <hu> sanctus Gregorius sprecð be unrihtum hæmede.

Gif hwa mynecene þe godes bryd bið gehaten him to wife nimð, beo he amansumad fram <eallra> geleaffulra manna gemænscipe, halige bec secgeað, þæt he beo eallswa scyldig wið crist swa þæs cynges þeowa wære, gif he wið þæs cinges gebeddan hæmde.

Gif hit ahwænne swa gelimpð swa hit ne gewurðe, þæt ænig man þurh deofles <costnunga> on befealle, todo man <hi> on twa, & beo heora ægðer æfre hreowsigende & betende þa hwyle þe hi on life beon, eall be biscopes dome.
Be þam men þe gelomlice wifþing begæð.

Nis na alyfed nænigum cristenum <men> nu, þæt he oftor wifige þænne tuwa, forðan sanctus Paulus hit forbyt on his lare & tæcð ælcum men hu he ymbe þæt don sceal, þæt is gif hwylces weres forme wif bið dead, þæt he be leafe oðer niman mote, & gif he þa oferbit, wunige he a syððan wifleas.
Wif eallswa, gif hyre forman were forðsið gebyrige, be leafe heo nime oðerne, gif heo þæt geceosan wyle, & gif heo þæne oferbit, wunige heo a syððan on wudewanhade þa <hwile> þe hire lif si.
& gif <ahwænne> wer oððe wif þas ðing abrecað, ne ortrywen hi na godes mildheortnesse, ac gecyrran & beten swa hira scrift heom tæce.
Be þam hu gesynhiwan heora þeawas healdan sceolan for gode.

Halige bec tæceð hwæt ælcum geleaffullum were to donne is, þonne <he> his rihtæwe ærost ham bringeð, þæt is æfter boca tæcinge þæt hy þreora daga & nihta fyrst heora clænnesse healdan sceolon, & þonne on þone þriddan dæg heora mæssan gestandan & hy butu husl niman, & syððan heora gesynscipe healdan for gode & for worulde swa heora þearf sy.
& ælcon gesynhiwen gebyreð, þæt hy heora clænnesse healdon XL daga & nihta ær þam halgan eastron & ealle þa easterwican & æfre sunnannihte & wodnesnihte & frigenihte.
& ælc æwfæst wif healde hire clænnesse III monþas ær þam byrðre, & æfter þære acennednesse healde hire clænnesse XL <daga> <&> nihta, beo hit hysecild beo hit mædencild.
Be þam men þe gedwællice þing begæð.
Gif hwylc man his ælmessan gehate oððe bringe to hwylcum wylle oððe to stane oððe to treowe oððe to ænigum oðrum gesceaftum butan on godes naman to godes cyrcean, fæste III ger on hlafe & on wætere.
& þeah he geþristlæce þæt he æt swylcum stowum ete oððe drince & nane lac ne bringe, fæste he þeah hwæðere an gear on hlafe & on wætere.
Be þam þe alyfed nis idele hwatunga to beganne.

Nis na soðlice nanum cristenum men alyfed þæt he idela <hwatunga> bega swa hæðene men doð, þæt is þæt hi gelyfen on sunnan & on monan & on steorren ryne & secen tida hwatunga hira þing to beginnenne, ne wyrta gaderunga mid nanum galdre butan midpater noster& mid credo oððe mid sumon gebede þe <to> gode belimpe.
Gif hwa þas idelan þing bega, geswice & andette & fæste XL daga, & gif he eft to þære idelnesse gehwyrfe, þonne fæste he III lengten.
Be mansware, hu man þæt <gebetan> scyle.
Gif hwylc læwede man hine forswerige & he wite þæt he manswærige, fæste IIII gear, gif he bið gemænes hades man, fæste V gear, subdiacon VI, diacon VII, mæssepreost X, bisceop XII.
& gif hwa bið genydd þæt he manswerige oððe he þæt man nyte, fæste III gear, an ger on hlafe & on wætere, & þa twa swa his scrift him tæce, & gif hine onhagige, gefreoge ænne man for godes lufan.

& gif hwa for æniges mannes ege oððe lufe oððe for ænigum sceatte hine forswerege, dæle his æhta þearfendum mannum & fare to mynstre & bete swa his scrift him tæce & hreowsige a þa hwile <þe> he on life beo.
Be stale.
Gif hwylc man stele deorwurðe þing, gif he bið læwede man, fæste V ger, subdiacon VI, diacon VII, mæssepreost X, bisceop XII.
& gif hwylc man medeme þing stele, agife þa stale þam þe hi ahte & fæste I ger on hlafe & on wætere, & gif he næbbe þa stale to agifanne, fæste III ger on hlafe & <on> wætere.
Be leasre gewitnesse.
Gif hwa on leasre gewittnesse beo, nis him <na> alyfed þæt he husles onfo ær he andette & bete swa his scrift him tæce.
Be <ungeðwærnesse> wið his nehstan.
Soðlice nis nanum cristenum men alyfed, þæt he on godes cyrcean gode lac offrige þa hwile þe he nið oððe andan oððe ænige unþwærnesse on his heortan hæbbe wið his þone nehstan.
Forþam his lac ne beoð gode andfenge, ærþam þe he hine sylfne geðwærie & gegladige wið his nehstan.

Forþam se hælend cwæð on his godspelle, gif þu lac bringe to godes weofode, & þu þær gemunst þæt þin broðor þæt <is> ælc cristen man sy ungeðwære wið þe, forlæt þær þine lac & ga to þinum breþer & geðwæra <þe> wið hine, & syððan <cume> to þam weofode & offragode gecweme lac.
Be hatheortnesse.
Gif hwylc man to þam hatheort sy & strangmod, þæt he to nanum worldrihte & sibbe fon nelle wið þæne þe wið hine agylt hæfð, beo he amansumad.
Be þam men þe aðas sylð, þæt he to sibbe fon nelle wið his nehstan.
Se man þe for hwylcere ungeðwærnesse winð wið his nehstan & to þam <strið> bið þæt he aðas sylð, þæt he to nanre sibbe fon nelle æt þam þe wið hine agylt hæfð, beo he amansumod.
Gif he þonne gecyrran wyle & to sibbe fon, fæste an ger for his aðes þingon & III lengteno on hlafe & on wætere, & þæs geares ofereacan fæste swa <him> his scrift tæce.
Be þam þe alyfed nis þæt ænig man his feoh to unrihtum gafole sylle.

Ælcum geleaffullum men is forboden, þæt he his feoh ne his æhta to nanum unrihtum gafole ne læne, þæt is þæt he hine <maran> ne bidde to agifanne þonne he him ær lænde, ac for lufe & for þearfe læne gehwa oðrum his feoh & his æhta, swa he wylle þæt man him do.
Gif hwa for hwylcere manfulre gitsunge þis do, halige bec <him> tæceað III geara fæsten, an ger on hlafe & on wætere, & þa II swa him his scrift tæce.
Her onginð se forma capitul, be gehadodra manna wifunga.
Gif mæssepreost oððe diacon wifigen, þolian heora hades.
& gif hy æfter þam hæmedþing begað, na þæt an þæt hy behadod syn, ac eac swylce fæston VII gear be bisceopes dome.
Be þam men þe gyrnð sacerdhades.

Gif <se> mæssepreost geleahtrod wæs mid heaofdlicum leahtrum ær he gehadod wære & þæt ær andette & bette swa him his scrift tæhte, gif he eft syððan he gehadod bið þa ylcan leahtras begæð þe he ær bette ne bið he na wyrðe þæt he ænige þenunga æt godes weofode do, ac wunige him elles mid gemænes hades mannum, & gif he gecyrran wyle, bete swa se bisceop him tæce.
Be <mæssepreostum>.
Gif mæssepreost oððe diacon man <ofslea> oððe hi forswerigen, þolian heora hades, & gif hi to bote gecyrran wyllan, betan be bisceopes dome.
Eft be godes þeowum.
Godes sacerdas & diaconas & oðre godes þeowas þe on godes temple gode þenian <sceolon> & haligdom & halige bec handlian, þa sceolon symble heora clænnesse healdan.
Þonne gif ænig swa gerad man on hæmedþing befealle, andette his scrifte & bete swa he him tæce.
Forþam se hælend cwæð, beon ge halige, forþam þe ic drihten god & eower hlaford eom halig.
Be þam <hu> se sacerd hine healdan sceal & se <diacon>.

Ða sacerdas & diaconas & þa godes þeowas þe hi sylfe ne magon <ne> nellað for gode þa clænnesse healdan þe him beboden is, ascyrige man hy fram þære þenunge þe clæne men on godes huse gode þeniað, & gif hi þonne gecyrran & andettan wyllan, betan swa hira scrift him tæce.
Be <þam> bisceopum & be oðrum godes þeowum.
Soðlice eallunga is forboden on haligum bocum ælcon bisceope & abbude & mæssepreoste, þæt hi nænigne wifmannes neawiste mid him <næbban>.

Ge eac swylce ælcon godes þeowe þe on clænnesse gode þeowian scyle is forboden, þæt he naðer ne his magan ne oðerne wifman for nanes weorces þingon <inne> mid him næbbe, þy læs he þurh deofles costnunge þæron gesyngie.
Be <þam> gehadedum mannum þe heora feoh <lænað> to hyre.

Gif bisceop oððe mæssepreost oððe hwylc godes þeow lænð his feoh to unrihtum gafole & ne geman hwæt se hælend cwæð þurh Dauid þone sealmsceop, he cwæð, þæt þa sceoldan his rices brucan þe heora feoh to nanum <unrihtum> gafole ne syllað.
Gif hwa þis abrecð, ne bið he wyrðe þæt he husl underfo, ærþam þe he gebete swa herbufan awriten is, þæt is III geara fæsten.
Eft be gehadodra manna wicnungum.
Nis nanum mæssepreoste alyfed ne diacone, þæt hy gerefan beon ne wicneras, ne ymbe nane worldbisgunge abisgod butan mid þære þe hy to getitolode beoð.
Be þam þe gehadod man geðoftrædene nimð wið wifman.
Se riht godes þeow þe mid godes þeowdome abysgod byð, ne gebyreð him na to farenne fram stowe to stowe ne fram huse to huse wifmannes <neawiste> gyrnende butan his lareowes leafe.
Þonne gif hwa þisne gewunan hæbbe, geswice & bete swa his scrift him tæce.
Eft be þam <ylcan>.

Se munuc þe hine sylfne gode behat & þone halgan regol underfehð, ne gedafenað him na þæt he æniges worldlices wyrðmyntes gyrne oððe <þæt> abrece þæt he gode behet, gif he þis deð, beo he amansumad fram eallum geleaffullum mannum.
Be muneces mishealdnesse & mynecene.
Munuc & <mynecene> þe gode sylfum beoð gehalgode & heora gehat gode behaten habbað, gif hi þonne þurh deofles <costnunga> þæt abrecað, beon hy <ascyrode> fram eallum gehadedum mannum.
& gif hi to gode gecyrran wyllað þe hy ær wiðsocon, andettan & beton þa hwile þe hi on life beon swa heom þære scire bisceop tæce.
Be wifmannes <þenunge> on godes weofode þe hire to ne gebyrað.

Gelomlice we habbað geræd on halgum bocum, þæt hit alyfed nis þæt ænig læwede wif & unsyfre godes geryno on cristes weofode handlian sceole ne haligdom ne ða halgan bec þe gehadode man handlian sceolan, forþam sanctus Paulus hit hæfð swiðe forboden.
Be þam þe <ælc> sacerd sceal cunnan his gerihto.
Ælcon sacerde gebyreð þæt he cunne þa halgan lare þe to his hade belimpð & folc mid læran & trymman sceal to godes rihte & to heora sawle þearfe.
Be þam þe sanctus Agustinus sende to rome to sancte Gregorie, & hu <sanctus> Gregorius him andsware sende.

Sona swa sanctus Agustinus on engla þeode fulluht gebroht hæfde & godes þeowas gehwær gesett & geendebyrd hæfde, þa sende he ærendgewrit to Rome to sancte Gregorie þe þa wæs papa & bæd hine, þæt he him sende on gewrite, hu him to donne wære ymbe þa nihtlican besmitenesse þe foroft mannum on slæpe gelimpð, hwæðer he þæs on morgen to husle moste gan oððe husel halgian gif he mæssepreost wære.
& he him þa wislice andsware sende & cwæð, þæt ælc godes þeow geornlice smeagean sceolde, fram hwilcum þingum seo nihtlice besmitenes cume.

Forþam of þreom þingum heo cymð þam slæpendan on mode, hwilon for þære gecyndelican untrumnesse & <tydernesse>, hwilon for oferflownesse ætes & drinces, hwilon eac þæt se man geþencð & smeað on dæg idele þing & unalyfedlice, þonne þæt he on dæg geþencð waciende, þæt him becymð on niht slæpende.
Þonne gif hwa besmiten beo on swefne for þære flæsclican tydernesse, nah he þæs geweald, þingie him georne wið god & him forgifenesse bidde.

& gif hit gelimpð for oferflownesse <metes> oððe drynces, he bið gyltig, & nis him þeah husl to forbeodenne ne mæsse to singanne gif he mæssepreost bið, gif hit oferneod beo & þær oðer sacerd ne beo þæt þa þenunga forð do.
Gif þær þonne oðer beo þæt þa þenunga don mæge, betere him is þæt he þæs dæges <hit> forga & him georne mid his sealmsange & mid ælmessan forgifenesse bidde.

Gif hit þonne on þa þriddan wisan gelimpð, þæt se man on dæg geseo oððe geþence oððe smeage ymbe unalyfede þing & idele lufe þærto nimð & lustbærnesse & þonne þurh þæt & þurh deofles hiwunga besmiten bið on slæpe, nis þam alyfed husl to nimanne þæs morgenes þe him on niht swa gelimpð, ac he ah þearfe þæt he hit andette & bete swa him his scrift tæce.
Be þam ðe þam sacerde naht ne fremeð þæt he rihtwis beo, gif he þam unrihtwisan styran nele heora unrihtes.

Se halga apostol Paulus læreð ælcum mæssepreoste þe godes folce to <lareowe> bið gesett, þæt heora nan ne wandige for nanes mannes ege ne for lufe ne for sceame ne for nanum sceatte, þæt hy ne bodian ælcon men hwæt him sy to donne & hwæt to forganne, gif hy sylfe wyllað þæt heom beo geborhgen on domesdæg beforan gode sylfum.
Be mæssepreosta drohtnunga.
Ælc mæssepreost sceal beon swa he gehaten is sacerd, þæt is grecisc word & is on ledensacrum dans& on ure geðeode halig syllend.
He sceal syllan halignesse þam folce þe he to lareowe & to hyrde bið gesett, þæt is <þæt> he sceal halige þeawas & bysna mannum æteowan.

Warnige hine þæt be him ne beo gecweden þæt egeslice word þæt se hælend cwæð be Israela folces hyrdum, þa he cwæð, Wa eow hyrdas, <þe> þæra eowena meolc ge brucon, & mid heora wulle ge eow scryddon, & þa ðe fætte wæron þa ge snidon, & þa ðe unstrange wæron þa ge ne gestrangedon ne þa wanhalan ge ne lacnedon, <&> þa ðe forbrocene wæron þa ge ne wriðon, & þa ðe tosceadene wæron þa ge ne samnedon, & þa forlorenan þa ge ne sohton.
Nu is eall min heord tosceacred, forþam hi næfdon nænne hyrde & synd geworden eallum wildeorum to mete.
Eall þis is gecweden be biscopon & be <mæssepreoston> þe godes folc on domesdæg to þam dome lædan sceolon, ælc þæne dæl þe him her on life ær betæht wæs.

Hit is þeah to witanne, hwy þeos feorðe boc sy uncapitulod, nu þa ærran bec synt gecapitulod, þæt is forþam þe þeos feorðe boc is genumen of þam þreom bocum, & þæt man on þam þreom hraðe findan ne mæg, hit man fint on þisse feorðan ægðer <ge> be maran þingum ge be læssan openlicor & hrædlicor.
Gif hwylc bisceop man ofslea, þolige his hades & fæste XII gear, þa VII on hlafe & on wætere, & þa V fæste III dagas on <þære> wican & þa oðre bruce his metes.
Gif mæssepreost oððe munuc man ofslea, þolige his hades & fæste X ger, þa V on hlafe & on wætere, & þa oðre V fæste III dagas on wican & þa oðre bruce his metes.
Gif diacon man ofslea, þolige his hades & fæste VII ger, þa IIII on hlafe & on wætere, & þa III fæste III dagas on wican & þa oðre bruce his metes.
Gif cleric man ofslea, fæste VI ger, þa IIII on hlafe & on wætere, & þa II fæste III dagas on wican & þa oðre bruce his metes.
Gif læwede man man ofslea, fæste V ger, þa III on hlafe & on wætere, & þa II fæste III dagas on wican & þa oðre bruce his metes.
Gif hwa gehadodne man ofslea oððe <his> nehstan mæg, forlæte his eard & his æhta & fare to rome to þam papan, & syððan do swa se <papa> him wisige.

Gif hwylc bisceop hæmedþing <drihð> oððe æwe brycð, fæste XII ger, & mæssepreost & munuc X ger, & diacon VII ger, <&> cleric VI <ger>, & læwede man V ger, fæste ælc be his endebyrdnesse, eallswa herbufan awriten is be manslehte.

Gif hwa hæme wið mynecene þe gode sylfum to bryde beweddod bið, gif hit bisceop deð, fæste XII ger, þa VII on hlafe & on wætere, & þa V fæste III dagas on wican on hlafe & on wætere, & þa oðre <dagas> bruce his metes butan flæsce <anum>.
Gif hit bið mæssepreost oððe munuc, fæste X ger, þa V on hlafe & on wætere, & þa V fæste III dagas on wican on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre bruce his metes butan flæsce anum.
Gif hit bið diacon, fæste VII ger, þa III on hlafe & on wætere, & þa IIII fæste III dagas on wican on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre bruce his metes butan flæsce anum.
Gif hit cleric oððe læwede man beo, fæste VI ger, þa III on hlafe & on wætere, & þa III fæste III dagas on wican on hlafe & on wætere & þa odre bruce his metes butan flæsce anum.
& seo mynecenu, fæste heo X ger, eallswa herbufan be þam mæssepreoste awriten is.
Gif hwylc man wolde hæman wið mynecenu & heo geðafian nolde, fæste he an ger for his unrihtwillan on hlafe & on wætere.

Gif hwa wolde hæman wið oðres mannes rihtæwe & heo geðafian nolde, fæste he for his unrihtwillan III <lencgten> on hlafe & on <wætere>, an lencten foran to middansumera, & oðer <foran> to hærfæstes emnnihte, & þridde to middanwintra.
Gif hwa wylle wið wifman unrihtlice hæman & heo geðafian nylle, fæste he XL daga & nihta on hlafe & on wætere.

Gif hwylc man reafað oðerne æt his dehter, bete wið þa freond, & fæste heora ægðer I ger wodnesdagum & frigedagum on hlafe & on wætere, & þa oðre dagas brucan heora metes butan flæsce & nime hy syððan to rihtæwe, gif þa freond þæt wyllað.

Gif hwylcne man deofol to þam swiðe undergan hæbbe þæt he wið dumbe nytenu hæme, andette his scrifte & fæste XV ger, þa VIII on hlafe & on wætere, & þa VII fæste ælce geare III lencten on hlafe & on wætere, an lencten ær eastron, oðer ofer pentecosten, þridde ær middanwintra, & æfre fæste wodnesdagum & frigedagum þa hwile þe he libbe.

Gif hwa on gewunan hæbbe þæt he hine sylfne besmite his agenes willes, fæste III ger, on ælcon þæra geara III lencten on hlafe & on wætere, & þa oðre dagas forga ælce dæge flæsc butan <sunnandæge> anum.
Gif ænig man oðerne mid wiccecræfte fordo, fæste VII ger, þa III on hlafe & on wætere, & þa IIII <ger> III dagas on wucan on hlafe & on wætere.

Gif hwa drife stacan on ænigne man, fæste III ger, an <ger> on hlafe & on wætere, & þa III <ger> fæste III dagas on wucan on hlafe & on wætere, & gif se man for þære stacunge dead bið, þonne fæste he VII ger ealswa herbufan awriten is.

Gif hwa wiccige ymbe æniges mannes lufe & him on æte sylle oððe on drence oððe on æniges cynnes galdorcræfte, þæt heora lufe for þam þe mare beon sceole, gif hit læwede man do, fæste <he> healf ger wodnesdagum & frigedagum on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas bruce his metes butan flæsce <anum>.
Gif hit bið cleric, fæste an ger twegen dagas on wican on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas forgange flæsc.
Gif he beo diacon, fæste III ger twegen dagas on wican on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas forgange flæsc.
Gif hit bið mæssepreost, fæste V ger, þæt an on hlafe on wætere, & þa IIII <ger> ælce frigedæge on hlafe & on wætere & ælc þæra oðra daga forgange flæsc.

Gif hwa hlytas oððe hwatunga bega, oððe his wæccan æt ænigum wylle hæbbe oððe æt ænigre oðre gesceafte butan æt godes cyrcean, fæste he III ger, þæt an on hlafe & on wætere, & þa II wodnesdagum & frigedagum on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas bruce his metes butan flæsce anum.
<Wifman> beo þæs ylcan wyrðe, gif heo tilað hire cilde mid ænigum wiccecræfte oððe æt wega gelætan þurh <þa> eorðan tyhð, forþam <þæt> is mycel hæðenscipe.

Gif hwylc wif hire bearn mid drence on hire sylfre fordo hire agenes willes oððe mid ænigum þingum hit amyrre, fæste heo VII ger, þa III on hlafe & on wætere, & þa IIII <ger> þreo dagas on wucan on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre bruce his metes butan flæsce <anum>.
Gif hwylc læwede man oðerne wundige, gebete wið hine þa wundlan & begite him þa lacnunge & fæste an lencten foran to middanwintra, a oðerne dæg on hlafe & on wætere.
Gif hwa godes cyrcean brece for stale, agife þa stale & fæste VII ger swa hit herbufan awriten is be manslyhte.

Gif hwylc man stele mete oððe claðas & hine hungor oððe næced þærto drife, fæste III wican on hlafe & on wætere, gif he þonne þa stale agifan mæge, ne neadige man hine to fæstene, ac do man him forgifenesse for godes lufan.
Gif hwylc cristen man his agen bearn oððe his nehstan mæg wið ænigum wurðe sylle, næbbe he nænne gemanan mid cristenum mannum ær he hine alysed hæbbe of þam þeowdome.
Gif he þonne hine begitan ne mæge, dæle swa mycel feoh for hine swa he ær mid him nam & alyse oðerne of þeowdome & gefreoge þæne & fæste VII wican on hlafe & on wætere.
& gif he þæs gestreones næbbe þæt he hine alysan mæge, fæste þonne XXVIII wicæna on hlafe & on wætere.
Gif hwa blod ete oððe styrfig flæsc, & he hit for neode ne do, fæste XII wican a oðerne dæg on hlafe & on wætere.
& gif he hit for neode do, fæste III dagas on hlafe & on wætere.

Gif hwylc man mid arwan deor ofsceote, & hit þeah ætberste & hit man þonne ymbe þreo <niht> dead finde & þær hund oððe wulf oððe fox oððe bera on befangen hæbbe oððe ænig oðer deorcyn, ne abite his nan cristen man.
Gif wulf æniges cynnes orf <toslite> & hit for þam dead beo, ne abite his nan cristen man, & gif hit þonne hwa do, fæste he IIII wican on hlafe & on wætere.
& gif hit alyfeð & hit man syððan ofslyhð, bruce his man syððan be leafe.
Gif hwylc deor bið on nette awyrged, nis hit nanum men alyfed to brucanne, gif his hwa bruce, fæste IIII wican a oðerne dæg on hlafe & on wætere.
Gif hwa finde deadne fisc on fiscpole & he his bruce, fæste IIII wican wodnesdagum & frigedagum on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas forga flæsc.
& gif man on ea deadne fisc finde, bruce his man be leafe.
Gif hwylc gehadod man on huntað fare, gif hit beo cleric, forga XII monð flæsc, diacon II ger, mæssepreost III, bisceop VII.
Gif hwylc bisceop oððe ænig gehadod man hine oft rædlice oferdrince, oððe he þæs geswice oððe his hades þolige.
Gif munuc for <oferdruncennesse> spiwe, fæste XXX daga.
Gif mæssepreost oððe diacon for <oferdruncennesse> spiwe, fæste XL daga.
Se ðe þurh facn oðerne oderdrencð, fæste XL daga.
Beon gif hy man acwellað, cwelle hy man raðe, & ete man þæt hunig þæt hy ær worhton.
Gif mus on wætan befealle, do hy man aweg & astrede mid haligwætere, & gif heo cucu sy, þicge man þæne wætan, gif heo þonne dead sy, geote hit man ut & þwea þæt fæt.
Eft hit cweð on oðre stowe, gif þæs metes mycel sy ætsamne, strede mid haligwætere & þicge gif his þære sy, & þæt þonne for neodþearfe.
On þearfe fiftan cneorisse geleofe men hi moton gesamnian, & on þære feorðan gif hi gemette syn, ne sceade hi man, æt þam þriddan cneowe syn hy gesceadene.
Wif on hire monaðadle cyrcean ne sece ne to husle ne ga, <naðer> ne nunne ne læwede wif, & gif hy hit don, fæste XX daga.
Se ðe <awiht> þicge þæs þe hund oððe mus of æte oððe wesle widlige, & he hit wite, singe C sealma, gif he hit nyte, singe L sealma.
Se ðe sylle oðrum þæne wætan þe mus oððe wesle bið on adruncen, gif hit folces man sy, fæste III dagas, gif hit mynsterman sy, singe CCC sealma.
Se ðe hit ær nyste & eft wite, singe saltere.
Gif man <awiht> blodiges þicge on samsodenum mete, gif he hit nyte, fæste III dagas oððe singe saltere, gif he hit wite, fæste VII dagas.
Se ðe his sylfes blod on spatle mid ungewisse forswelge, nis þæt nan synn.
Gif hwa on his gymeleaste husl forleose, fæste III lenctenu ælce frigedæg on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas bruce his metes buton flæsce anum.
Gif seo onsægdnes on eorðan fealle for gymeleaste, singe L sealma.
Se ðe <forgymeleasige> gehalgod husl on þam þæt hit to lange licge þæt him sy unsyfernes on oððe hit næbbe his hiw, fæste XL daga.
Gif man husl aspiwe for druncennesse oððe for oferfylle, fæste XL daga.
Gif he for untrumnesse his husl aspiwe, fæste VII dagas oððe twegen salteras singe.
Gif man husl worpe on fyr oððe on stream þonne hit molsað to þicganne, singe he C sealma.
Gif hund þæne spiwðan frete, fæste C <daga>, gif he hit <nyste>, <fæste> XL daga.
Ælc husl þe bið on unsyfernesse oððe on ylde, forbærne man hit.
Gif mus ete husl for gymeleaste þæs <mannes> þe hit healdan <sceolde>, fæste XL daga.
Se ðe husles ænigne dæl on <cyrcean> forleose, fæste XX daga.
Se ðe on folce his crisman forleose & hine eft ne finde, fæste III lenctenu oððe an ger.
Se ðe his calic ageote on gemang mæssan, fæste XXX daga.
Se ðe ete ærþam þe he to husle ga & æfter þam hus þicge, fæste VII dagas.

Wer & wif þa ðe heom on hæmede geðeodde wæron, gif oðer wyle godes þeow beon, oðer nelle, oððe heora oðer bið untrum, oðer hal, swa þeah be heora begra geðafunge hyl dælon hy, gif hy wyllen, & þæt beo <be> bisceopes gewitnesse.

Se godes þeow þe on slæpe besmiten bið, arise & singe <his> VII sealmas & bige his cneowa to eorðan æt ælces ferses ende & fæste þæs on morgen on hlafe & on wætere oððe singe XXX þæra sealma þe him betste <þincen> & æt ælces ferses ende bige his cneowa to eorðan.
Gif swin oððe henna oððe æniges cynnes yrfe ete of mannes lichaman oððe of his blode <drince>, slea man þæt yrfe & sylle <hit> hundum.
Gif hwa bærne oðres mannes hus, fæste III ger <a> oðerne dæg on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas fæste to nones & forga flæsc.
Gif æniges cynnes yrfe fealle on wæterpytt & hit man þær dead finde, formige man þone pytt clæne & <strede> þæron haligwæter.
& gif hwa his onbyrge ær se pytt gehalgod sy, fæste ane wican on hlafe & on wætere, gif he hit <wite>, gif he hit nyte, fæste ænne dæg on hlafe & on wætere.

Gif hwa for his untrumnysse oþþe for his hnescnysse þæt fæsten & þa stiðnysse aberan ne mæg þe his scrift him tæcð, him ys alyfed þæt he mot his fæsten alysan mid godcundnysse & mid his worldæhton, þæt is þonne gif he byþ welig, sylle for XII monþa fæstenetriginta solidos, þæt is on ure geþeode XXX scillinga.

Gif hine to swa mycelum ne onhagige, þonne sylle he XX scyllinga, gif hine þonne to swa mycelum ne onhagige, sylle X scyllingas, gif hit þonne þearfigende mann beo, þæt him to X ne onhagige, sylle III scyllingas, forþon se welega mæg eaþor syllan XXX scillinga þonne se wædla þry.
Se rihtscylling byð a be twelf penegum.
Swa gerade ælmyssan man sceal on þreo wisan dælan, an ys þæt hig man uppan godes weofod legce, oþer þæt man gebicge man of þeowdome & hine syþþan gefreoge, þrydde þæt hig man godes þearfum dæle.

<Anes> dæges fæsten man mæg mid anum penige alysan oþþe mid twam hund sealmum, & on oðre wisan singemiserere mei dominusXII siþon & XIIpater noster& æt ælces ferses ende hine on eorþan astrecce ætforan godes weofode.
& gif se man sealmsang ne cunne, þonne singe he for anes dæges fæsten XLpater noster& swa oft hine on eorþan astrecce.
& VII wintra fæsten man mæg on XII monþum alysan, gif he ælce dæg asingeð saltere & oþerne on niht & an fiftig on æfen.

Mid anre mæssan man mæg alysan <XII> daga fæsten, & mid X <mæssan> man mæg alysan IIII monþa fæsten, & mid XX mæssan man mæg alysan <VIIII> monþa fæsten, & mid XXX mæssan man mæg alysan XII monþa fæsten, gif he wyle mid soþre godes lufe him sylfum þingian.
